snippet: Neil Reed, who died last week at 36, became known as the player choked by the volatile Indiana coach Bob Knight.
abstract: Harvey Araton On College Basketball column remembers Neil Reed, college basketball player who became known for 1990s choking incident at the hands of his Indiana coach Bobby Knight; notes that Reed died at age 36 because of heart complications.
lead_paragraph: Neil Reed, who died last week at 36, became known as the player choked by the volatile Indiana coach Bob Knight.

headline.print_headline: Caught in a Storm Named Knight
headline.seo: Neil Reed, an Ex-Indiana Player, Was Caught in a Storm Named Knight
headline.main: Caught in a Storm Named Knight
